properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 15 at 2:34PM AKST until February 18 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Travel will be
very difficult to impossible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to
8 inches, with localized amounts up to 11 inches, are possible.

* WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley.

* WHEN...From Sunday evening through late Monday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant
snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue
to monitor the latest forecasts.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT
